name: Liberosis (JAM Ver.)
description:
CW: Bullying, abuse, gaslighting, etc. Please be advised.

In the year 20XX, a rising company named LiberaTech made a major breakthrough in the world of psychology. They've introduced state-of-the-art technology involving simulation-based therapy. With that, many patients have reported feeling that their shoulders are carrying less burden. Though it hasn't cured depression, it was able to help them move on from their past traumas.

You are one of the many patients enrolled in this therapy by your parents due to decades-old trauma burdening your present life. Perhaps by chance, you were met with one of the founders of the company, Dr. Librel himself. Before being put into a simulation, he gave you an interview to help you reflect.

(Certain features will be expanded on the full version of this visual novel such as customizing yourself, the VR experience, and certain endings.)
developers: Hana No Zono, part-time game dev
